title: Platinum miner Sedibelo Resources files for IPO
text:
For the three months ended March 31, 2022, the company said it had revenue of $53 million. For the three months ended March 31, 2021, the company reported revenue of $95.8 million.

The company didn't give an expected size for its offering, nor did it give an anticipated price range.

Evercore ISI, J.P. Morgan and RBC Capital Markets are listed as the offering's underwriters.

Platinum miner Sedibelo Resources files for IPO
